sentences.sentence: Objective To compare different therapeutic methods in scalp avulsion.
sentences.translation: 目的比较头皮撕脱伤的不同治疗方法。

sentences.sentence: Even relatively minor trauma can result in avulsion of the spleenic substance .
sentences.translation: 甚至轻微的创伤就能引起脾实质撕裂。

sentences.sentence: We describe a case of a traumatic avulsion fracture of the distal phalanx of the hallux.
sentences.translation: 我们描述了一对拇末节撕脱骨折创伤的情况。
